name: Unsung Ballads
description:
Embark on an exciting adventure of epic proportions inspired by the rich folklore of south-eastern Europe.

In this turn-based roguelike card battler, take the role of a miller’s offspring, their life upended during a vicious raid, and shape their place in a war-torn medieval world.
Find companions to help you overcome adversity, train, collect and equip your party with better gear to give yourself an edge in the tests ahead.

A Fresh Spin on the Deckbuilding Genre
In Unsung Ballads, your equipment and your training will dictate what cards are available to you, and in what quantity.



Varied Card Play
Not all cards are created equal; some of them represent actions that the characters will take during their turn, while others only need to be kept in hand for them to be activated when certain conditions are met.




Character Progression
Manage the training of your party to better prepare them for the trials that await them. Only through focused training combined with battle experience will they progress from novices to masters of their weapons of choice.


Your actions will determine how people will remember you. Will they sing heroic ballads in every tavern, or will they whisper tales untold about your infamous exploits?

Only time will tell if your stories will become Unsung Ballads.
